name: RelativeSync
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Relative sync for Movement Parent & Chairs. Requires both users to have the mod installed. Synced over Mod Network.

Provides some Experimental settings to also fix local jitter on movement parents.
changelog:
- Recompiled for 2025r179
- Fixed execution order of RelativeSyncController so moving at high speeds with passengers does not disrupt voice or avatar distance hider
